verses.verse: And Yosef <WH3130> fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon his father's <WH1> face <WH6440>, and wept <WH1058> <WH8799> upon him, and kissed <WH5401> <WH8799> him.

And Yosef <WH3130> commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> his servants <WH5650> the physicians <WH7495> <WH8802> to embalm <WH2590> <WH8800> his father <WH1>: and the physicians <WH7495> <WH8802> embalmed <WH2590> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And forty <WH705> days <WH3117> were fulfilled <WH4390> <WH8799> for him; for so are fulfilled <WH4390> <WH8799> the days <WH3117> of those which are embalmed <WH2590> <WH8803>: and the Egyptians <WH4714> mourned <WH1058> <WH8799> for him threescore and ten <WH7657> days <WH3117>.

And when the days <WH3117> of his mourning <WH1068> were past <WH5674> <WH8799>, Yosef <WH3130> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto the house <WH1004> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, If now I have found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in your eyes <WH5869>, speak <WH1696> <WH8761>, I pray you, in the ears <WH241> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

My father <WH1> made me swear <WH7650> <WH8689>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Lo <WH2009>, I die <WH4191> <WH8801>: in my grave <WH6913> which I have digged <WH3738> <WH8804> for me in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, there shalt thou bury me <WH6912> <WH8799>. Now therefore let me go up <WH5927> <WH8799>, I pray thee, and bury <WH6912> <WH8799> my father <WH1>, and I will come again <WH7725> <WH8799>.
And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Go up <WH5927> <WH8798>, and bury <WH6912> <WH8798> thy father <WH1>, according as he made thee swear <WH7650> <WH8689>.

And Yosef <WH3130> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> to bury <WH6912> <WH8800> his father <WH1>: and with him went up <WH5927> <WH8799> all the servants <WH5650> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, the elders <WH2205> of his house <WH1004>, and all the elders <WH2205> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>,

And all the house <WH1004> of Yosef <WH3130>, and his brethren <WH251>, and his father's <WH1> house <WH1004>: only their little ones <WH2945>, and their flocks <WH6629>, and their herds <WH1241>, they left <WH5800> <WH8804> in the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>.
And there went up <WH5927> <WH8799> with him both chariots <WH7393> and horsemen <WH6571>: and it was a very <WH3966> great <WH3515> company <WH4264>.

And they came <WH935> <WH8799> to the threshingfloor <WH1637> of Atad <WH329>, which is beyond <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>, and there they mourned <WH5594> <WH8799> with a great <WH1419> and very <WH3966> sore <WH3515> lamentation <WH4553>: and he made <WH6213> <WH8799> a mourning <WH60> for his father <WH1> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>.

And when the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776>, the Kanahanites <WH3669>, saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the mourning <WH60> in the floor <WH1637> of Atad <WH329>, they said <WH559> <WH8799>, This is a grievous <WH3515> mourning <WH60> to the Egyptians <WH4714>: wherefore the name of it <WH8034> was called <WH7121> <WH8804> Hevelmizraim <WH67>, which is beyond <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>.
And his sons <WH1121> did <WH6213> <WH8799> unto him according as he commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> them:

For his sons <WH1121> carried <WH5375> <WH8799> him into the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, and buried <WH6912> <WH8799> him in the cave <WH4631> of the field <WH7704> of Machpelah <WH4375>, which Avraham <WH85> bought <WH7069> <WH8804> with the field <WH7704> for a possession <WH272> of a buryingplace <WH6913> of Ephron <WH6085> the Hittite <WH2850>, before <WH6440> Mamre <WH4471>.

And Yosef <WH3130> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> into Egypt <WH4714>, he, and his brethren <WH251>, and all that went up <WH5927> <WH8802> with him to bury <WH6912> <WH8800> his father <WH1>, after <WH310> he had buried <WH6912> <WH8800> his father <WH1>.

And when Yosef's <WH3130> brethren <WH251> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that their father <WH1> was dead <WH4191> <WH8804>, they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Yosef <WH3130> will peradventure <WH3863> hate us <WH7852> <WH8799>, and will certainly <WH7725> <WH8687> requite <WH7725> <WH8686> us all the evil <WH7451> which we did <WH1580> <WH8804> unto him.
And they sent a messenger <WH6680> <WH8762> unto Yosef <WH3130>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thy father <WH1> did command <WH6680> <WH8765> before <WH6440> he died <WH4194>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

So shall ye say <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yosef <WH3130>, Forgive <WH5375> <WH8798>, I pray thee <WH577> now, the trespass <WH6588> of thy brethren <WH251>, and their sin <WH2403>; for they did <WH1580> <WH8804> unto thee evil <WH7451>: and now, we pray thee, forgive <WH5375> <WH8798> the trespass <WH6588> of the servants <WH5650> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of thy father <WH1>. And Yosef <WH3130> wept <WH1058> <WH8799> when they spake <WH1696> <WH8763> unto him.
And his brethren <WH251> also went <WH3212> <WH8799> and fell down <WH5307> <WH8799> before his face <WH6440>; and they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, we be thy servants <WH5650>.
And Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not: for am I in the place of 'Elohim <WH430> ?

But as for you, ye thought <WH2803> <WH8804> evil <WH7451> against me; but 'Elohim <WH430> meant it <WH2803> <WH8804> unto good <WH2896>, to <WH4616> bring to pass <WH6213> <WH8800>, as it is this day <WH3117>, to save <WH2421> much <WH7227> people <WH5971> alive <WH2421> <WH8687>.

Now therefore fear <WH3372> <WH8799> ye not: I will nourish <WH3557> <WH8770> you, and your little ones <WH2945>. And he comforted <WH5162> <WH8762> them, and spake <WH1696> <WH8762> kindly <WH3820> unto them.

And Yosef <WH3130> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in Egypt <WH4714>, he, and his father's <WH1> house <WH1004>: and Yosef <WH3130> lived <WH2421> <WH8799> an hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> years <WH8141>.

And Yosef <WH3130> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> Efrayim's <WH669> children <WH1121> of the third <WH8029> generation: the children <WH1121> also of Machir <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519> were brought up <WH3205> <WH8795> upon Yosef's <WH3130> knees <WH1290>.

And Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his brethren <WH251>, I die <WH4191> <WH8801>: and 'Elohim <WH430> will surely <WH6485> <WH8800> visit <WH6485> <WH8799> you, and bring you out <WH5927> <WH8689> of this land <WH776> unto the land <WH776> which he sware <WH7650> <WH8738> to Avraham <WH85>, to Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and to Ya`akov <WH3290>.

And Yosef <WH3130> took an oath <WH7650> <WH8686> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, 'Elohim <WH430> will surely <WH6485> <WH8800> visit <WH6485> <WH8799> you, and ye shall carry up <WH5927> <WH8689> my bones <WH6106> from hence <WH2088>.

So Yosef <WH3130> died <WH4191> <WH8799>, being an hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>: and they embalmed <WH2590> <WH8799> him, and he was put <WH3455> <WH8799> in a coffin <WH727> in Egypt <WH4714>.
